list.name: asn
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT asn FROM hops WHERE asn IS NOT NULL ORDER BY asn

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.started_at as time, h.asn as metric, AVG(h.rtt_ms) as value FROM hops h JOIN measurements m ON m.id=h.measurement_id WHERE h.asn = CASE WHEN '${asn}' = '' THEN h.asn ELSE ${asn} END GROUP BY m.started_at, h.asn ORDER BY time
SELECT m.started_at as time, COUNT(DISTINCT h.asn) as value FROM hops h JOIN measurements m ON m.id=h.measurement_id GROUP BY m.started_at ORDER BY time
